biotools.summary: Query web based genome annotation tools HaploReg and RegulomeDB. It gathers information in a data frame which is suitable for downstream bioinformatic analyses. This will facilitate post-genome wide association studies streamline analysis for rapid discovery and interpretation of genetic associations.

bioschemas.name: haploR
